=====================
Nested KE groups
=====================

mi ke ke klama ke'e ke'e bo citka
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (selbri
      (tanru_unit
        (ke)
        (selbri (tanru_unit (ke) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))) (kehe)))
        (kehe))
      (bo)
      (tanru_unit (word)))))
